summary: H.R. 319, introduced by Representatives Simpson and Fulcher, seeks to add a federal district judgeship for the district of Idaho. The bill authorizes the President to appoint one additional district judge, subject to Senate confirmation. This action would increase the total number of permanent district judgeships in Idaho to three. The legislation includes a technical amendment to update the United States Code to reflect this change. The bill has been referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary for further consideration.
